scripts.compile-cjs: tsc --project . --module commonjs --outDir cjs/ --moduleResolution node10 && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > cjs/package.json
scripts.compile-esm: tsc --project . --module es2022 --outDir esm/ --moduleResolution node && echo '{"type": "module"}' > esm/package.json
scripts.compile: npm run compile-cjs && npm run compile-esm
scripts.test-cjs: mkdir -p cjs-test && cd test && tsc --project . --module commonjs --outDir ../cjs-test/ --moduleResolution node10 && cd ../cjs-test && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > package.json && mocha --exit --no-package
scripts.test: npm run test-esm && npm run test-cjs
